channel.title: Test Doubles :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: This page lists the milestone requirements for Milestone 6 of the CC 410 Restaurant Project. Read the requirements carefully and discuss any questions with the instructors or TAs. Purpose The CC 410 Restaurant Project project for this semester is centered around building a point of sale (POS) system for a fictional restaurant named Game Grub, offering food of all kinds to celebrate our love of games of all kinds. The fifth milestone involves writing unit tests for the order, combo, and associated classes created in the previous milestone.
